        public AvailabilityStatus getAvailabilityStatus(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
        Get the availability status of the person for the slot (of the duration determined by the time interval of the planner) starting at a determinate datetime.

      • getAvailabilityStatusList

        public java.util.List<AvailabilityStatus> getAvailabilityStatusList(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                                                    java.time.LocalTime timeStart,
                                                                    java.time.LocalTime timeEnd)
        Get a list of availability status of the person for each slots (of the duration determined by the time interval of the planner) from a time to another time for a specific date.
        Parameters:
        date - the concerned date
        timeStart - the start time
        timeEnd - the end time
        Returns:
        the list of availability status for each slots of the duration determined by the time interval of the planner, sorted chronologically
